pages.text: A strange, semi-sentient gelatinous substance that pools in Vespera's underground caves. It is not a traditional food source, but consuming it seems to temporarily attune my senses to the planet's resonant frequencies, causing me to glow.

pages.title: Collection
pages.text: The gel is too viscous to be collected in a bucket. It must be carefully scooped into a $(l:https://minecraft.wiki/Glass_Bottle)Glass Bottle$() directly from the source pool. Doing so consumes the source block.
